verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Put on the garments of praise,
for the spirit of heaviness
Let the oil of gladness flow down
from Your Throne

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Put on the garments of praise,
for the spirit of heaviness
Your joy is my strength alone,
my strength alone

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Make these broken weary bones
rise to dance again
Wet this dry and thirsty land
with a river
Lord our eyes are fixed on You
and we are waiting
For your garland of grace
as we praise Your Name

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, sing hallelujah
We give all honor and praise to Your Name
Hallelujah, sing hallelujah
We trade our sorrows for garments of praise
